listings.comment: Vivek has been awesome. He is patient,creative and was a significant part of the development of the site. I feel like he understands what we want to accomplish and continued to work with us to deliver a great product. We will continue to work with Vivek as we do more creative work on our site and as we grow our business. Outstanding is all I can say and hope that he continues to get awesome projects. A true partner and someone who cares about the quality and attention to detail. Don’t hesitate to engage Vivek on your next project.

Really recommend Vivek, overall good service and happy with the end product of the website. 

Good and simple communication and always happy to make amendments. 

Reasonable price and would recommend.

Vivek's work was outstanding. He fully grasped our requirements and demonstrated a keen attention to detail. After the initial delivery, he remained proactive, ensuring he was available for any additional support or changes, which he made promptly and efficiently. He is highly capable and efficient. His work met all of our expectations, and his ability to focus on details is exceptional. Throughout the process, he was always polite and professional, and communication was seamless, allowing the project to progress smoothly. We would be more than happy to collaborate with him again.

Vivek J truly impressed with his INCREDIBLE attention to detail and high level of professionalism in website design. Working with him was a breeze, thanks to his quick responsiveness and clear, proactive communication. Highly recommend his services! 🙌
Great job -- Vivek is easy to work with, cost effective and listens extremely well in order to make the vision come to life!
